Name: Cloud
Message: Cloud solutions are seen as convenient and standard and are therefore no longer questioned.

Name: Cloud
Message: More land is needed for the giant server farms!

Name: Cloud
Message: A monopoly formation of the Hoster arises, because one sets on the same offerers and services (AWS / Apple / Google)

Name: Cloud
Message: Gets sensitive metadata, and also makes users dependent because they store the data with them.

Name: Cloud
Message: Private data are no longer stored at home, where you have physical control over them, but are now the property of the data center.

Name: Cloud
Message: Power consumption and space requirements are increasing.

Name: Cloud
Message: Due to the new possibilities that come with the user data, the risk of a questionable motivation to abuse the data for an increase in market value.

Name: Cloud
Message: Society learns over the years that data does not belong to them, so no one has a sense of privacy anymore.

Name: Cloud
Message: Pressure to expand the Internet infrastructure is increasing, as otherwise the population will no longer have access to their data stored in the cloud.

Name: Home Stationed
Message: The entire family can use the device.

Name: Home Stationed
Message: Through home placement, not only the user's usage data but also that of family and friends can be stored.

Name: On Device Storage
Message: Only limited memory available on the device.

Name: On Device Storage
Message: Because the data is stored locally on the device, potential data leakage vulnerabilities are reduced and the data belongs to the user himself.

Name: Plastic
Message: Plastic is not biodegradable. It can remain in the environment for up to hundreds of years. Also the recycling process is not an easy and clean one.

Name: Plastic
Message: Plastic can find its way into the oceans through improper disposal, but also in the form of microplastic!

Name: Plastic
Message: Plastic recycling means that plastic is still produced. Also the recycling process is not infinitely applicable and the processes are usually not environmentally friendly or carbon emission free.

Name: Plastic copy
Message: Fish can suffocate on the plastic or eat harmful microplastics.

Name: Social Integration
Message: A new ad format especially for IoT is being developed to infect this medium as well.

Name: Social Integration
Message: New ways of distributing advertising with IoT are being developed.

Name: Social Integration
Message: Through social media integration, the platforms pick up important meta-information from the users.

Name: Speech Recognition
Message: Danger due to bias in language models.

Name: Speech Recognition
Message: For the training and for running the recognition, a high energy consumption results!

Name: Wearable
Message: Components must become smaller and smaller, so more or more precise machines are needed.

Name: Wearable
Message: Due to the new features, fewer watches are sold and more classic watches are delivered to the store, which can lead to waste.

Name: Wearable
Message: Transaction data is recorded everywhere and thus represents a potential vulnerability in their privacy for the users

Name: Wearable
Message: Loses his job to a machine because he can no longer assemble the fine materials by hand.

Name: Wearable
Message: A Wearable requires finer materials and a finer finish. More machines are now needed because employees are no longer able to assemble the fine parts by hand quickly enough.

Name: Wearable
Message: There are fewer and fewer specialists for the small components, so more has to be produced overseas. The use of freighters is increasing.

Name: Wearable
Message: A real design trend of wearable devices has started.

Name: Wearable
Message: The components of the devices are so small and special that they cannot be reused!

Name: Wearable
Message: Chips and components are getting smaller and smaller to fit into a portable device.

Name: Wearable
Message: The ever smaller devices present engineers with new challenges

Name: Wearable
Message: Since the device can no longer be shared due to portability, everyone in the family wants their own, which puts a strain on the family budget.

Name: Wearable
Message: Insurance companies make use of the movement and fitness data of the wearable to calculate insurance costs.

Name: Wearable
Message: Movement and health data are transferred to IoT Corp.

Name: Wearable
Message: An affair is revealed based on the stored motion profile on the device. The device was not safe from jealous partners.

Name: Wearable
Message: A better coverage of the Internet is needed to cover the increasing number of portable devices.

Name: Wearable
Message: Now has private data of the users and must decide how to deal with it!

Name: Wearable
Message: Potential misuse with the data and vital data are collected only from a certain group of people, those who have the income to pay such a wearable.

Name: Wearable
Message: The collected vital data could be used to train early detection of diseases.

Name: Wearable
Message: The number of location data collected is increasing rapidly!

Name: Wearable
Message: The special small components must be transported together all over the world for assembly.

Name: Wearable
Message: Gets an awareness of his vital signs.

Name: Wearable
Message: The relationship with the jealous partner ends because an affair with the transaction data was uncovered when the device was not locked.

Name: Wearable
Message: As the components become more and more special and smaller, a large part of the garbage pickers' income is lost.

Name: Wearable
Message: Increased overseas transport increases noise pollution in the oceans. Whales and other audio-sensitive animals are exposed to higher stress levels.

Name: Wearable
Message: More devices strain the home network. Frustration levels rise.

Name: Wearable / Cloud
Message: Population demands nationwide Wifi / Internet, as devices are used more and more mobile and do not work without Internet.

Name: WILDCARD
Message: Increased risk of collision with transporter ships, as well as health risks from their waste water and ballast water discharges.

Name: WILDCARD
Message: Lead, cadmium, chrome and flame-retardant plastics are also found in electronic waste, which are hazardous to health!

Name: WILDCARD
Message: Acoustic pollution from shipping traffic causes marine mammals to experience higher levels of stress, suppression of vital communication and can lead to hearing loss.

Name: WILDCARD
Message: There is an increased risk of pollution of the marine environment, through ballast water discharges or leakage water from engine and machinery spaces. If the ship runs aground or is damaged, extreme oil pollution may occur.

Name: WILDCARD
Message: The cargo ships cause a large amount of acoustic, air and water pollution, which has a strong negative impact on the environment!

Name: WILDCARD
Message: The user is not able to repair the device on his own.

Name: WILDCARD
Message: Unaudited and unchecked data sets lead to incorrect decisions.
